description:
[img]/art/image/edit.jpg[/img]
This causes many Event Ques which is, as many players have complained over the years, very annoying.

If you have to really build a car then
- Press ESC
- Click Main Menu
- Click Garage

There you can enjoy building your car and everyone is at peace.
Otherwise you may soon be kicked.
name: You appear to be building/tuning a Car
